ConnectionStrings.DefaultConnection: Data Source=EARTH\EARTH; Initial Catalog=DevelopBase; Integrated Security=True

SqlQueries.Employees: SELECT Id, SystemName AS MachineName, Name, Birthday, ipv4 AS IpAddress, Mac AS MacAddress FROM DevelopBase.twt.Employee
SqlQueries.Files: SELECT fls.Id, fls.Name, fls.Description, fls.FileName FROM twt.Files AS fls
SqlQueries.Dictionary: SELECT dic.id, dic.Name, dic.Description, dic.SqlExpression FROM DevelopBase.twt.Dictionary AS dic
